a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of people that are undernourished
Undernourishment is measured as having a caloric intake which is insufficient to meet the minimum energy
requirements necessary for a given individual. Countries with undernourishment rates below 2.5% are not shown.
Source: UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO)
Note: Undernourishment is defined as having food energy intake which is lower than an individual's requirements, taking into account their age,
gender, height, weight and activity levels.
